title: Saiki Kusuo no Ψ-nan: Extra Story of Psychics
original_name: 斉木楠雄の Ψ 難　 EXTRA STORY OF PSYCHICS
sinopse:
New disasters for ESPer Saiki Kusuo… Nendou starts talking about Nietzsche, Kaidou becomes a Wizard at Kitsune High…!? Caught in the trap of a jumbo ramen challenge, and what’s the reason Saiki is absent from school…!? A novelized compilation of daily life stories. Celebrating the 1 year anniversary of serialization for the popular JUMP manga Saiki Kusuo no PSI nan! What new disasters await Saiki? A collection of 5 short stories, 4 extra short stories, illustrations, and pull out posters.

(Source: Official site)
